xyz.morphia.mapping.codec

Class DocumentWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.morphia.mapping.codec.DocumentWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bson.BsonWriter

    public class DocumentWriter
extends Object
implements org.bson.BsonWriter
    Specialized writer for serializing a Document.

    This is an internal class and is not for use outside Morphia.

      Creates a new Writer
